title: How to Complete the Prologue of Professor Layton and the Unwound Future

steps.headline: Watch the animated scene when you start the game.
steps.description: You'll find a letter that Luke wrote, supposedly ten years in the future. The letter asks you to go to the clock shop. Professor Layton and Luke are now questioning each other of how the letter was written. Layton believes that the letter is connected to an event that happened recently.

steps.headline: Watch an animated scene that happened a week ago.
steps.description: Barton and Chelmey will have a discussion about the feast and invitations. Tap on either one of them while they're sitting down. Tap on either Caroline or Bill Hawks (the people on the right).

steps.headline: Tap on the guard (the skinny guy looking around).
steps.description: He'll tell you that there's been a report of suspicious behavior. Puzzle 001 will come up.

steps.headline: Tap on the presenter (the chubby guy next to the machine).
steps.description: He presents the time machine's creator, Stangun . Bill Hawks, whom is the Prime Minister, doubts the operation of the time machine and Stahngun offers him a try in it. Watch the animated scene of Hawks getting into the machine. As the machine starts, it suddenly blows up.

steps.headline: Go through another conversation between Professor Layton and Luke in the bus.
steps.description: You'll find out that another set of mysteries have been happening around London. They both agree to go to the Clock Shop.

steps.headline: Watch as they arrive in the town.
steps.description: Professor Layton gives Luke a puzzle, Puzzle 002, to see if he can locate the shop.

steps.headline: Tap on Florence.
steps.description: She'll tell you to tap on the car, which will pop out a hint coin. Tap on the highest window of the left hand side building, the skinny bus schedule on the right (next to the shoe), and carefully examine the tree. When you need to carefully examine something, it means tap on it more than once. Head North.

steps.headline: Get hint coins here.
steps.description: Tap on the circle sign, the first window of the right hand side building, and the blue door in the far back middle.

steps.headline: Tap on Vito and he'll give you Puzzle 003.
steps.description: If you solve it, he'll help you on where to find the clock shop.

steps.headline: Head north and tap for hint coins.
steps.description: They can be found in the top window, the circle window of the door, and the box in the corner of the street intersection. Tap on Stachenscarfen to talk to him. He was going to tell you about hint coins, but because someone else has offered the advice, he quickly goes away.

steps.headline: Tap on the stairwell on the left to trigger Puzzle 004.
Head North and pick up three hint coins.
steps.description: They can be found on the second to the bottom stair, the sign below the clock, and along the right hand side of the arc.

steps.headline: Tap on the back door to get Puzzle 005.
Watch the scene as they enter the room.
steps.description: Spring will automatically talk to you. She's heard all about Professor Layton, but wants to see proof that it is the real him. Solve Puzzle 006 for her.

steps.headline: Tap on the huge clock to get Puzzle 007.
Tap for hint coins.
steps.description: They can be found in the bottom right hand side of the cabinet next to Spring, the "12" Roman numeral on the clock-face, and the orange button on the machine.

steps.headline: Walk South and tap for 3 more coins.
steps.description: They are hidden on the first poster up against the counter, the small clock in the back, and the bottom corner of the clock on the ground.

steps.headline: Tap the big clock face on the right to get Puzzle 008.
steps.description: Springs husband, Cog, comes back. He wants Professor Layton to fix his clock, which will give you Puzzle 009.

steps.headline: Watch the scene as the clock starts.
steps.description: Professor Layton and Luke exit the clock shop, but realize that they are locked out. They also find out that the scenery and activity outside has changed. Chapter 1 starts.

text: Watch the animated scene when you start the game. You'll find a letter that Luke wrote, supposedly ten years in the future. The letter asks you to go to the clock shop. Professor Layton and Luke are now questioning each other of how the letter was written. Layton believes that the letter is connected to an event that happened recently. Watch an animated scene that happened a week ago. Barton and Chelmey will have a discussion about the feast and invitations. Tap on either one of them while they're sitting down. Tap on either Caroline or Bill Hawks (the people on the right). Tap on the guard (the skinny guy looking around). He'll tell you that there's been a report of suspicious behavior. Puzzle 001 will come up. Tap on the presenter (the chubby guy next to the machine). He presents the time machine's creator, Stangun . Bill Hawks, whom is the Prime Minister, doubts the operation of the time machine and Stahngun offers him a try in it. Watch the animated scene of Hawks getting into the machine. As the machine starts, it suddenly blows up. Go through another conversation between Professor Layton and Luke in the bus. You'll find out that another set of mysteries have been happening around London. They both agree to go to the Clock Shop. Watch as they arrive in the town. Professor Layton gives Luke a puzzle, Puzzle 002, to see if he can locate the shop. Tap on Florence. She'll tell you to tap on the car, which will pop out a hint coin. Tap on the highest window of the left hand side building, the skinny bus schedule on the right (next to the shoe), and carefully examine the tree. When you need to carefully examine something, it means tap on it more than once. Head North. Get hint coins here. Tap on the circle sign, the first window of the right hand side building, and the blue door in the far back middle. Tap on Vito and he'll give you Puzzle 003. If you solve it, he'll help you on where to find the clock shop. Head north and tap for hint coins. They can be found in the top window, the circle window of the door, and the box in the corner of the street intersection. Tap on Stachenscarfen to talk to him. He was going to tell you about hint coins, but because someone else has offered the advice, he quickly goes away. Tap on the stairwell on the left to trigger Puzzle 004.  Head North and pick up three hint coins. They can be found on the second to the bottom stair, the sign below the clock, and along the right hand side of the arc. Tap on the back door to get Puzzle 005.  Watch the scene as they enter the room. Spring will automatically talk to you. She's heard all about Professor Layton, but wants to see proof that it is the real him. Solve Puzzle 006 for her. Tap on the huge clock to get Puzzle 007.  Tap for hint coins. They can be found in the bottom right hand side of the cabinet next to Spring, the "12" Roman numeral on the clock-face, and the orange button on the machine. Walk South and tap for 3 more coins. They are hidden on the first poster up against the counter, the small clock in the back, and the bottom corner of the clock on the ground. Tap the big clock face on the right to get Puzzle 008. Springs husband, Cog, comes back. He wants Professor Layton to fix his clock, which will give you Puzzle 009. Watch the scene as the clock starts. Professor Layton and Luke exit the clock shop, but realize that they are locked out. They also find out that the scenery and activity outside has changed. Chapter 1 starts.
